^(max_results)$.description: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned.

^(page_token)$.description:
Specifies a page token to use. Set pageToken to the nextPageToken returned
 by a previous list request to get the next page of results.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned.

name.description: The schema name to query. It's case-insensitive.

pageToken.description:
Specifies a page token to use. Set pageToken to the nextPageToken returned
 by a previous list request to get the next page of results.

share.description: The share name to query. It's case-insensitive.
